entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
